b.h1: Accept and view the location of the gang.

f.t1:
The heroes previously declared
bandits have merged into
a new independent faction.
f.t2: The Guild cancels all rewards for the heads of it's representatives.

r.t1: You captured the leader of the gang!
r.t2:
The leader begs for mercy and is ready to swear allegiance to you.
 If you do not agree you will not get a reward for a bounty.
r.h3: Recruit hero and decline the reward
r.h4: Execute the bandit and claim bounty on his/her head

opt725.e: Now that the fight between factions is over, all the gangs have disbanded and will no longer interfere with your rule!
